column6: cooked green or orange vegetables (for example, broccoli, spinach, carrots or pumpkin)
cooked dried or canned beans, peas or lentils (preferably with no added salt)
green leafy or raw salad vegetables
medium potato or other starchy vegetables (sweet potato, taro or cassava)
medium apple, banana, orange or pear
small apricots, kiwi fruits or plums
diced or canned fruit (no added sugar)
fruit juice (no added sugar). Only occasionally
dried fruit (for example, 4 dried apricot halves, 1.5 tablespoons of sultanas). Only occasionally
cooked rice, pasta, noodles, barley, buckwheat, semolina, polenta, bulgur or quinoa
cooked lean red meats such as beef, lamb, veal, pork, goat or kangaroo
cooked lean poultry such as chicken or turkey
cooked fish fillet or one small can of fish
cooked or canned legumes/beans such as lentils, chick peas or split peas (preferably with no added salt)
nuts, seeds, peanut or almond butter or tahini or other nut or seed paste (no added salt). Only occationally
fresh, UHT long life, reconstituted powdered milk or buttermilk
soy, rice or other cereal drink with at least 100mg of added calcium per 100ml
firm tofu (check the label as calcium levels vary)
